item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0550; 10:35AM; 18569 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M1oHZn; Tarzana; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was primarily in the common (about 2' high) attic and moved horizontally down the B side (West) towards the C side (North) of the building. The truck companies on the roof created holes in the roof and used handlines to extinguish the bulk of the fire while interior fire attack address fire in the walls in (at least) one unit. Firefighters will remain on scene for salvage and overhaul operations. Cause of the fire and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E305 E73 E83 E84 EM17 RA73 T105 T73 T88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0550; 09:55AM; 18569 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M1oHZn; Tarzana; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit and traveling up the walls. Additional resources requested (reflected in this alert). Any additional units impacted by the smoke are being evacuated.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E100 E273 E288 E73 E83 RA73 T73 T88 E84 CM42 LF105 EM17 BC10 ; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1152; 07:43PM; 1198 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Cnu2r0; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in two hours and 37 minutes with no injuries reported. The mop up will continue (helicopters are still making water drops to assist) well into the evening. No further details.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E285 E290 E36 E38 E40 E48 E49 E57 E79 E85 E90 EM13 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 HT3 RA85 T85 T90; CH7; 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Grass Fire; INC#1152; 06:01PM; 1198 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Cnu2r0; Wilmington; The fire is estimated at 5 acres with light wind conditions. The smoke plume will be visible for an extended because of the type of fuel burning (marsh reeds) and the difficulty in reaching the fires edge. Additional engines due to the access challenge and the need for water shuttles to provide the water supply. There are no structures threatened. Firefighters will be working this fire into the evening. There are no injuries reported. Two engines from @LBFD are on scene assisting. No further details.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E101 E112 E36 E38 E40 E48 E49 E57 E79 E85 RA85; CH7; 16; Margaret Stewart

Grass Fire; INC#1152; 05:06PM; 1198 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Cnu2r0; Wilmington; Approximately 1 acre of medium grass burning in Harbor Park. Additional engines were added due to the lack of fire hydrant access, requiring a water shuttle operation to bring water to the engines supplying the hose lines. There are no structures threatened and no injuries reported.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E36 E38 E48 E49 E85; CH7; 16; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0983; 02:48PM; 646 N New High St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sq3kDr; #Chinatown; It took 58 firefighters 33 minutes to locate, confine, and extinguish a contents-only fire on the second floor of a vacant commercial building. Firefighters successfully defended two other adjacent businesses. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E3 E4 E9 RA17 RA4 SQ21 T1 T2 T3 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0983; 02:15PM; 646 N New High St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sq3kDr; #Chinatown; Approx 100' x 50' commercial building with heavy smoke showing.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E3 E4 E9 T1 T2 T3; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1583; 09:05PM; 22255 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e0uguB; #WoodlandHills; *Corrected Address* 28 Firefighters extinguished the flames in 35 minutes. No reported injuries.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E105 E227 E273 E288 E293 E296 E305 E72 E84 E88 E93 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA827 T105 T27 T73 T88 T93 T96 UR27 UR88; CH8; 15 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1583; 08:30PM; 4500 N San Feliciano Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RoU6WW; Woodland Hills; *Tentative Address* Two-story vacant home with heavy fire showing.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E305 E84 RA105 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1381; 06:59PM; 3483 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dRizX6; #HollywoodHills; 45 Firefighters mounted a coordinated attack to quickly surround the brush fire and extinguish the flames in 40 minutes, holding it to less than one-quarter of an acre. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E290 E52 E60 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA82 RA86 T27 T60 T90; CH5; 16; Nicholas Prange
